mapper.insert: insert into chinese.comment(uid, aid, text, time) VALUES (#{comment.uid}, #{comment.aid}, #{comment.text}, #{comment.time})
insert into chinese.comment(uid, aid, text, time) VALUES (#{chat.uid}, -1, #{chat.text}, #{chat.time})
mapper.delete: delete from chinese.comment where id=#{id}; delete from chinese.reply where `from`=#{id};
